task_name: choose a phone for my mom
task_description: Task to choose a phone for my mom

must_have: Voice assistant compatibility for hands-free use
Availability of health apps to monitor fitness
High storage capacity for photos and apps
nice_to_have: A phone with a stylus for easy navigation and note-taking
Durable and drop-resistant for accidental falls
Customizable home screen with favorite apps easily accessible
deal_breakers: Phone is not compatible with hearing aids
Price exceeds the budget set for the purchase

technical: Something that works well with the internet but I don't really know how fast it needs to be
A good camera, I think, but not sure about the megapixels or whatever
It should have enough storage, I guess, but not too much or it might be complicated?
non_technical: I want it to be easy to use, but also have all these fancy features that I don't quite understand
Something that looks nice and feels modern, but again, I'm not sure what that means
I heard battery life is important, but I'm not entirely sure how to measure that

must_meet: Must be within the budget, but I might consider going a bit higher if it looks good
Should work with voice assistants, but I'm not clear on which ones are best
should_meet: It should ideally have good reviews, but I can’t remember where I saw them
I think it should have health apps, but only if they are easy to find
nice_to_meet: If it has a stylus, that would be cool, but I’m not sure if that’s really necessary
It would be great if it's tough enough to survive drops, but I don't know how to check that
